#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int compare (const void *a,const void *b)
{
	return (*(int*)a-*(int*)b);
}

int main()
{
	int n;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	int a[n];
	for (int i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		int n1;
		scanf("%d",&n1);
		int a1[n1],a2[n1];
		for (int i1=0;i1<n1;i1++)
		scanf("%d",&a1[i1]);
		for (int j=0;j<n1;j++)
			scanf("%d",&a2[j]);
		int count=0;
		qsort(a1,n1,sizeof(int),compare);
		qsort(a2,n1,sizeof(int),compare);
		int c=0;
		for (int i2=0;i2<n1;i2++)
		{
			for (int i3=0;i3<n1;i3++)
			{
				if(a1[i2]<=a2[i3])
				{
						count++;
						a2[i3]=0;
						break;
				}
			}
		}
		a[i]=count;
	}
	for (int i4=0;i4<n;i4++)
	{
		printf("%d\n",a[i4]);
	}
}
